name: Recychill
description:
Controls

WASD or Arrow keys - Movement

E - Pick/Drop an object

SHIFT - Run

ESC - Pause

Description

In Recychill you control Genaro, a grown man who decides to pay a visit to a nearby lake to relax from his stressful routine, only to find out that the lake and the surrounding forest is full of trash. It's now his job to clean the mess and finally have time to relax. But be careful! If you take too much time or you put things in the wrong container too many times, Genaro's stress will rise and you'll loose the game.

Credits

Jorge Pan - Game Designer and 3D Artist

Nicolás Fernández - Programmer and 3D Artist

Andrés Hormigo - Programmer and 2D Artist
